maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Sullyvan
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Sullyvan

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Seeker? Aren't there some wild people you need to help?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] ? N'y a-t-il pas de sauvages que vous devez aider ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Sullyvan
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Sullyvan

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Look who it is. I already heard of your heroic deed.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Regardez qui est là. J'ai déjà entendu parler de vos actions héroïques.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Thanks for that, now the power plant is accessible to my people again.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Merci pour ça, maintenant le chemin jusqu'à la centrale est enfin accessible à mon peuple.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Sullyvan
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Sullyvan

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: You have to listen to me, Mayor Sullyvan.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Vous devez m'écouter, Maire Sullyvan.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: You again? If you want to speak to me, please make an appointment.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Encore vous ? Si vous voulez me parlez, prenez un rendez-vous s'il vous plait.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: This is an emergency! Things are about to escalate!
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: C'est une urgence ! Les choses vont bientôt dégénérer !

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Sullyvan
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Sullyvan

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: I'm so sorry sir, she just burst in...
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Je suis désolé, sur, elle vient de forcer le passage...

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: It's okay Penny, this seems... important.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: C'est bon, Penny, ça à l'air... important.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: You can go.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Vous pouvez y aller.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Penny
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Penny

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Yes, sir...
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Oui, sir...

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Sullyvan
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Sullyvan

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Alright. So, what is it?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Bon, donc, qu'est-ce que c'est ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: The village of \c[3]V'rda\c[0] is currently under attack by dangerous creatures. We've already lost the entire north of the village.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Le village de \c[3]V'rda\c[0] est actuellement attaqué par des créatures dangereuses. Nous avons déjà perdu tout le nord du village.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Oh. I'm very sad to hear that. But how does this concern us in any way?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Oh. Je suis désolé de l'entendre. Mais en quoi cela ça nous concerne ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: You see... The Shad are \c[3]blaming the power plant\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Vous voyez... Les Shads \c[3]accusent la centrale électrique\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Well, of course! They always do. And I always tell them the same thing:
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Oui, naturellement ! Ils le font toujours. Et je leur dis toujours la même chose :

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: The power plant is fine. We make sure it's all in perfect harmony with your oh-so-holy track.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: La centrale électrique va bien. Nous faisons en sorte qu'elle soit en parfaite harmonie avec votre sacro-saint tracé.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Please listen. Things are not the same! We are desperate.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: S'il vous plait, écoutez-moi. Les choses ont changées ! Nous sommes désespérés.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: The Shad now started a protest in front of the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] as we speak.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Les Shads ont maintenant commencé un barrage en face du \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0] en signe de protestation à l'heure où nous parlons.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: They want to stop the power plant and are ready to use force.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Ils veulent arrêter la centrale électrique, par la force s'il le faut.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: What? You Shad want to use force? With sticks and stones? Don't make me laugh!
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Quoi ? Vous les Shads voulez utiliser la force ? Avec des piques et des pierres ? Laissez-moi rire !

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: I know you hold little respect for us, but I beseech you, don't let this end in a blood bath!
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Je sais que vous n'avez aucun respect pour nous, mais je vous en supplie, ne laissez pas ceci se terminer en bain de sang !

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: What choice do I have? You know as well as I do that we depend on the power plant.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Et qu'est-ce que j'ai comme choix ? Vous savez autant que moi que nous dépendons de cette centrale.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: We can't simply turn it off.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: On ne peut pas simplement l'arrêter.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: I'm very much aware. What you can do is help us free the village from those creatures.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: J'en suis conscient. Ce que vous pouvez faire est de nous aider à libérer le village de ces créatures.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: If you do, things might calm down again. A few of your guards should suffice...
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Si vous le faites, les choses pourraient se calmer à nouveau. Quelques de vos gardes devrait suffire...

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: You wild people come around with your petty problems and I'm supposed to spare some guards for you...
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Vous les sauvages vous venez ici avec vos petits problèmes et je suis censé épargner quelques gardes pour vous...

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Speaking of annoyances! What's that \c[3]Seeker \c[0]doing back there?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: À propos de problèmes ! Qu'est-ce que ce \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0] fait ici ?
... Salut ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Oh! I didn't even see you there.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Oh ! Je ne vous avais pas vu ici.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Well, isn't this perfect?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Bien, n'est-ce pas parfait ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: If you need somebody to deal with your “creatures”, I'm sure a Seeker like this will do the job!
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Si vous avez besoin de quelqu'un pour vous occuper de vos "créatures", je suis sûr qu'un \v[lore.title.seeker] comme ça fera le travail !

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: If you want to access the temple to the north, it's in your interest to resolve this dispute quickly, right?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Si vous voulez accéder aux temples du nord, c'est dans votre intérêt de résoudre cette contestation, pas vrai ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Please Seeker, we're in dire need of any help.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: S'il vous plait, \v[lore.title.seeker], nous avons besoin d'aide urgente.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Thank you so much!
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Merci beaucoup mille fois !

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Great! That settles it.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Bien ! Ça devrait suffire.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: The Seeker can do her thing and everybody will be happy.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Le \v[lore.title.seeker] peut faire son truc et tout le monde sera content.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: I now see you hold little respect for Seekers as well.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Je vois maintenant que vous n'avez pas plus de respect pour les \v[lore.title.seeker]s non plus.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: My job here is to run a city in the middle of a dense jungle!
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Mon travail ici est de m'occuper d'une ville au milieu d'une jungle épaisse !

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: I don't have time for wild people and adventurers.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Je n'ai pas de temps pour les sauvages et les aventuriers.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: You two do what you must to solve your problems.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Vous deux, faites ce qu'il faut pour résoudre vos problèmes.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: And make sure you free the passage to the power plant soon or I will become another problem for you.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Et faites en sorte de libérer le passage vers la centrale électrique bientôt ou c'est moi qui vais devenir votre prochain problème.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Now, if you'd please excuse me!
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Maintenant, si vous pouvez m'excuser !

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Meet me outside Seeker, I'll tell you everything I know.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Rencontrez-moi dehors, \v[lore.title.seeker], je vais vous expliquer tout ce que je sais.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: I've had enough of his arrogance.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: J'en ai assez de son arrogance.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Solve the quest \c[3]An Infested Village\c[0] together with Apollo and Joern.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Résolvez la quête \c[3]Un Village Infesté\c[0] avec Apollo et Joern.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Such arrogance! This mayor encapsulates himself in his own world, blocking off all outside issues!
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Quelle arrogance ! Ce maire s'isole tout seul dans son propre monde, en ignorant tous les problèmes autour de lui !

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.orig: Indeed, very much like his iron-walled city.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-ma.text: Exactement comme cette ville entourée de murs d'acier.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig:
\c[3]4F\c[0]: \c[4]Serious Business\c[0]
\c[3]3F\c[0]: \c[4]More Business\c[0]
\c[3]2F\c[0]: \c[4]Business\c[0]
\c[3]1F\c[0]: Mayor's Office
\c[3]GF\c[0]: \c[4]Quest Hub\c[0]
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text:
\c[3]4e E\c[0] : \c[4]Affaires sérieuses\c[0]
\c[3]3e E\c[0] : \c[4]Plus d'Affaires\c[0]
\c[3]2e E\c[0] : \c[4]Affaires\c[0]
\c[3]1e E\c[0] : Bureau du Maire
\c[3]RDC\c[0] : \c[4]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0]

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Greetings Seeker. Do you have any business with the mayor?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Avez-vous une affaire à discuter avec le maire ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Are you sure?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Vous êtes sûre ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Do you perhaps want to proceed along the \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0]?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Vous souhaitez peut-être continuer sur le \c[3]\v[lore.title.track-of-ancients]\c[0] ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Then you don't need to see the mayor.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Alors vous n'avez pas besoin de voir le maire.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Your next task as Seekers is to visit the temples in the \c[3]north of Gaia's Garden\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Votre prochaine tâche en tant que \v[lore.title.seeker] est de visiter les temples au \c[3]nord du \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: All Seekers are free to enter those dungeons, no permission required!
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Tous les \v[lore.title.seeker]s sont libres d'entrer dans ces donjons, pas besoin d'autorisation nécessaire !

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Maybe also tell your fellow Seekers that they don't have to show up here. They just keep doing it.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Peut-être dites aussi à vos chers collègues \v[lore.title.seeker]s qu'ils n'ont pas besoin de venir ici. Ils continuent de le faire encore et encore.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Why would they even want to see the mayor anyway?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Pourquoi est-ce qu'ils ont besoin de voir le maire en tout cas ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: It's not like he has any business with the track, right?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Ce n'est pas comme s'il avait quelque chose à faire avec le tracé, pas vrai ?

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Force of habit I suppose?
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: La force de l'habitude, probablement.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: It seems the mayor of this town doesn't want to be involved in any of the Seeker's business!
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: On dirait que le maire de cette ville ne veut pas être impliqué dans quoi que ce soit avec les \v[lore.title.seeker]s !

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: No need to visit the \c[3]mayor\c[0] this time. You can just head straight to the temples of \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0]!
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Pas besoin d'aller le \c[3]maire\c[0] cette fois. Vous pouvez juste aller directement au temple du \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0] !

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Greetings Seeker.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: If you want to proceed along the \c[3]Track of the Ancients\c[0] you don't need to see the mayor.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Si vous voulez continuer sur le \c[3]\v[lore.title.track-of-ancients]\c[0], vous n'avez pas besoin de voir le maire.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Just visit the Temples in the \c[3]north of Gaia's Garden\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Allez juste visiter les temples au \c[3]nord du \v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: I'm sorry Seeker, but thanks to this noisy Shad I have my hands full with re-scheduling.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Je suis désolé, \v[lore.title.seeker], mais à cause de ce bruyant Shad, j'ai les mains pleines pour redécaler tous les rendez-vous.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Hello Seeker, the Mayor is free if you want to visit him.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker], le maire est libre si vous voulez le voir.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Her again...
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Encore elle...

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Wow, that was rude.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Mon dieu, quelle impolitesse.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: Cool, thanks to this weird Shad I now have to wait for my appointment with the mayor.
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: Cool, à cause de ce Shad étrange j'ai maintenant besoin d'attendre pour mon rendez-vous avec le maire.

maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.orig: GF: Lobby
maps/jungle-city/interior/questhub-02-of.text: RDC : Hall d'Entrée
